name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Jilin University also requires students to fill out a questionnaire with the same content as yesterday's "A Certain University in Shanxi"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Contributions from netizens
The School of Applied Science and Technology of Shenyang Urban Construction University has a problem of exaggerated propaganda and false enrollment.
It is reported that when recruiting students, it was advertised as a full-time college degree. However, it is actually an adult student status for full-time teaching.
As a result, students now have no student status on Xuexin.com after four years of study. I paid tuition for four years and had no academic qualifications.
I complained to the local education department but got no response

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On March 27, a Weibo user posted that someone at Beijing Language and Culture University secretly took photos of girls taking yoga classes and sent them to a WeChat group for sexual fantasies
It was later revealed that this person was Yan Weixiong, a teacher at the Teaching Software Development Department of Beijing Language and Culture University.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submissions
On March 28, the long-lost patriotic artist Wuhe Qilin published his latest painting, calling for "I hope that the panda Yaya will return home soon and stop suffering in that hellhole."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, someone exposed on Douyin that there was favoritism and fraud in the election of the villagers' committee of Shanglang Village, Foshan City, Guangdong Province
The video said that the villagers who nominated themselves to run for election were detained by the relevant departments and forced to sign a statement to withdraw from the election.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On March 28, in Wuhan Optics Valley, Shuguang Village was about to build a village-level primary school, which would take in school-age children from nearby Poly, Gemdale, and China Construction Grand Mansion. Concerns about the quality of teaching caused dissatisfaction among the owners of these communities, and repeated communications with the government were ineffective.
Today, the owners of the community went to the Optics Valley High-tech Government Center to defend their rights and clashed with the relevant departments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On March 24, the General Office of the Hainan Provincial People's Government issued a notice on several measures to support the development of the private economy
The document stated that a fair and just legal environment should be created, and private entrepreneurs involved in cases should not be arrested if they can be avoided, should not be prosecuted if they can be avoided, should not be sentenced to actual imprisonment if they can be avoided, and should be released or the compulsory measures should be changed in a timely manner if they can be detained without further detention.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the morning of March 28, Ma Ying-jeou and his entourage went to Nanjing Sun Yat-sen Mausoleum to pay homage, which prevented ordinary tourists from entering the park and caused public dissatisfaction.
A citizen at the scene shouted "What's so great about Ma Ying-jeou?" "He has not contributed to peace!"
He was then verbally summoned and taken away by the public security police on the side for "suspected of disturbing public order".

It is reported that Ma Ying-jeou bowed three times and presented flowers to Sun Yat-sen's coffin in the name of "Former Chairman of the Kuomintang Ma Ying-jeou" today, and then inscribed "Peaceful struggle to revitalize China". After the ceremony, he made a public speech in China for the first time. He said that he hoped that both sides of the Taiwan Strait would work together in peace to revitalize China and pursue peace. In addition, he believes that the pursuit of peace "is the unavoidable responsibility of the Chinese on both sides of the Taiwan Strait, and we must work hard to achieve it", otherwise both sides will "have no future".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User submissions
On March 21, Google said that it had removed the app from the Google Store because it found malware problems in multiple versions of Pinduoduo.
According to the "Pinduoduo Backdoor Detailed Report" on GitHub, Pinduoduo used a lot of means to circumvent privacy supervision and break through system restrictions to obtain accurate user portraits and promote user conversions. "It turned 400 million user devices into a botnet that was completely controlled by it for profit. It is the largest intrusion in history, and even the NSA can't do it."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the morning of March 28, the State Council Information Office held a press conference. Shen Yue, director of the Illegal and Bad Information Reporting Center of the State Internet Information Office, pointed out that illegal and irregular behaviors that maliciously damage the image and reputation of enterprises and entrepreneurs online, and even seek illegal profits from them, will be severely cracked down on.
At present, all kinds of false and untrue information targeting enterprises and entrepreneurs, especially private enterprises and private entrepreneurs, appear from time to time online, damaging the brand image of enterprises, infringing on the legitimate rights and interests of entrepreneurs, and even affecting the normal production and operation of enterprises, causing enterprises to suffer economic losses and entrepreneurs to suffer reputational damage. The central government is very concerned about this issue, and the business community has a strong response.
This year, the State Internet Information Office is preparing to launch a special action of "Clear and Bright, Optimizing the Business Network Environment and Protecting the Legitimate Rights and Interests of Enterprises", which is to focus on typical and prominent problems that damage the business environment online, carry out concentrated special governance, and improve long-term working mechanisms. This is also one of our specific work measures to implement the central decision-making and deployment.
